_header: Lord undo my lips Jesu heaven king
_description: Eight introductory couplets prefixed to the York Hours of the Cross

YorkMinXVIK6.First Lines:
LOrde vn do myn lyppis Ihesu heuen kyngAnd my mouthe sall say
                    þi loueyng…
YorkMinXVIK6.Last Lines:
…We wyrchyppe þe cryste Ihesu god sonffor with þi
                    holy cros þis world hauys þu won
YorkMinXVIK6.Editions:
Simmons,  Thomas Frederick. 
             The Lay Folks’ Mass Book.
EETS
         o.s. 71 (1879); repr. 1968: 82.
